LIKE_GREET: We might not synthesize you, for now.
DEFESIVE_PACT: Are ready to be our battle thrall?
BORDER_WARS: Our scanners have detected %1$s in our sectors.We will start synthesize with your species!
ASK_PROTECTION: We have detected danger. We are paying for protection of 5 star years.
ASK_MOVE_FLEET: Your fleet %1$s is in our sector! Pull it away immediately!
OFFER_SPY_TRADE: We are offering you our spy information for 20 star years. Interested?
MAKE_WAR: We will start synthesize with your species!%1$s
TRADE_EMBARGO: We ask you to make trade embargo for 20 star years against %1$s?
DECLINE_WAR: We will not accept but your species is good synthesize material for us!%1$s
NOTHING_TO_TRADE: We see you have nothing to trade with us, except yourself!
NEUTRAL_GREET: We haven't decide if you will be synthesized %1$s!
OFFER_REJECTED: Our offer was not good enough, what do you offer then?
ALLIANCE: Be our thrall or be our future synthesize material. Join to our alliance!
TRADE_ALLIANCE: Your species has trading value for us, trade alliance?
DEMAND: You will accept this or we will synthesize your species!
AGREE: We will agree with your offer!
